titleStmt.title: A practicall discourse concerning Gods decrees. In two parts. The first concerning mans unfitnesse to dispute against the decrees of God: out of Rom. 9.20. The second tending to assert and cleare Gods absolute election of a limited and certaine number unto eternall life: out of Acts 13:48. By Edvvard Bagshavve st. of Ch. Ch.
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

titleStmt.title: A practicall discourse concerning Gods decrees. In two parts. The first concerning mans unfitnesse to dispute against the decrees of God: out of Rom. 9.20. The second tending to assert and cleare Gods absolute election of a limited and certaine number unto eternall life: out of Acts 13:48. By Edvvard Bagshavve st. of Ch. Ch.
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Hen. Hall printer to the University for Tho. Robinson,

notesStmt.note: "Gods absolute election of a certaine and limited number unto eternall life" has separate pagination and dated title page lacking Robinson's name in imprint; register is continuous.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 12 Jan: 12."; the 9 in the imprint date has been altered to an "8".
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
